From Interstate I-71, take Ohio Exit 28 south on State Route 48 approximately 3.5 miles to the intersection of State Route 48 with Montgomery Road (State Route 22 & 3), then another 1.6 miles south on State Route 48 to downtown for the City of Maineville as reckoned by the intersection of Foster-Maineville Road and State Route 48.

One may also reach downtown Maineville by taking the Montgomery Road exit from I-275, driving north 8.4 miles, then turning south (right) on State Route 48 1.6 miles.
The Maineville zip code of 45039 also encompasses Hamilton Township, Warren County and the unincorporated area of Landen.
Maineville situated between three major airports:

value: Port Columbus International Airport, Columbus, Ohio (CMH)
James M Cox Dayton International Airport, Dayton, Ohio (DAY)

Each airport can be accessed from Maineville with at least some portion of interstate driving.

Estimated driving times from Maineville to the airports are:

value: Maineville to CVG: 45 minutes; I-71 South to I-71/I-75 South to I-275 West to Airport Exit.
Maineville to CMH: 90 minutes; I-71 North to I-670 East to Airport Exit, Exit #9.
Maineville to DAY: 60 minutes; Tylersville Road to I-75 North, through downtown Dayton, to I-70 West to Airport Exit.

, 105 S. Broadway, Lebanon, Ohio. (513) 932-1817. Acclaimed as one of the nation's top county museums. The museum preserves the largest display of Shaker artifacts in the country. Paleontology and archeology exhibits are also featured, as well as the popular Village Green Exhibit where antiques are displayed in re-created store fronts for unique viewing.
content=And 3 (Montgomery Road), Maineville, OH 45039, (513) 683-5500. Baskets, wicker furniture, candles, candies and other curio.

content=And 3, Ste. C-300. Bulk jewelry chain, jewelry findings and jewelry-making supplies. Specializing in bulk jewelry chains with matching findings, OhioBeads.com currently offers over 100 styles of jewelry chain, including Antique Copper Chain (Copper Ox Chain), Antique Brass Chain (Brass Ox Chain), Gunmetal Chain, Silver-Plated Chain, Gold-Plated Chain, Sterling Silver Chain, and Gold-Filled Chain. (Internet only; not a retail location.)
